shopify.gallery

Byron Bay Skincare

11-07-15
1 minute read

In an effort to make Pixyll easier to customize and more aesthetically pleasing, we’ve release version 2.0.

Pixyll now features:

  • Line anchors in code blocks and new syntax highlighting
  • A customizable variables file
  • Modular, and lighter weight CSS
  • No more max-width media queries

In a nutshell...

We love Shopify and wanted to create a showcase that gives merchants insight into what’s possible on Shopify and inspire other designers and developers using the platform.
